Detailed Description

Models the situation where a cashier is done their shift and wants to leave. 

 ShiftCompletedEvent:
   T Q.each -> ChangeLineUp @ t+1
   T self -> CashierDepartureEvent @ f()

time the time at which this event occurs

Member Function Documentation

void ShiftCompletedEvent::action (  )  [inline, virtual]

The method called when this event "happens".

For each person standing in line at this checkout, send them a ChangeLineUpEvent, then trigger an CashierDepartureEvent as soon as the current customer is gone.

Externals

Cashier, ChangeLineUpEvent, CashierDepartureEvent, Customer

Implements Event.
